text.name: T-3 Collector Mace Max Activation
text.desc:
If target has [TimeSuspend], deal +30% damage
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Coin Power +1
[EndSkill] Lose [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] on self
[EndSkill] Gain [OutisNoHat] (once per Encounter)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 3 [Vibration] on target
- Gain +([Vibration] consumed x 2) [Vibration] Count
- Inflict ([Vibration] consumed - 1) [Binding] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

[OnStartCoin] Consume all [Vibration] Count on self
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Vibration] Count consumed (max 5)
- Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Vibration] Count consumed (max 50%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Borrowed Time - Microcavity
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] If this unit is not in a [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] state, gain 4 [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] at Turn End (once per turn)
[WinDuel] Apply +2 [Vibration] Count to both the target and self
[DefeatDuel] Gain +4 [Vibration] Count

1111321.name: Expeditious Execution of Official Duties
1111321.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed deals +10% damage when attacking a Staggered target.

1111301.name: Golden Time - Microcavity
1111301.desc:
Turn End: If this unit's HP is between 10% ~ 20%, instantly heal 80% of this unit's max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

If this unit has [TimeRentalTwoPersonality], its Skills gain Final Power +1

notes.short: Defend to gain {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality} which buffs her for 3 turns then debuffs for a turn. While having {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality}, consumes it to inflict {status:TimeSuspend} (store damage then burst as {keyword:Sloth}) with S3. Inflicts {status:VibrationChainPersonality} (lose Clash Power) on her S2 if the target isn't already in {status:Switch_Vibration}. Gets a free heal at 10-20% HP once per encounter.
notes.full:
Using her defense will give her {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality} which buffs her for the next 3 turns giving her 3, then 2, then 1 stack of {status:Agility}, {status:ParryingResultUp}, and {status:Vulnerable}. On the 4th turn she gets 6 {status:Binding} and 8 {status:Aggro}. This sequence can't be overwritten by defending again, but you can start it again on the 4th turn when she loses the status. While having {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality}, her S3 can consume it (cutting the sequence short) to deal additional damage, trigger an additional {status:VibrationExplosion} and apply {status:TimeSuspend}.

{status:TimeSuspend} prevents the enemy from receiving damage for 2 turns (the current and the next turn), instead collecting all that damage to deal 130% of that total as {keyword:Sloth} damage at the end of the 2nd turn. You can end the effect and get the burst damage early by applying another instance of {status:TimeSuspend} whether from Outis or from the other T corp. Identities.

Gains {status:Vibration} Count on S1 and S2. If her target has 10+ {status:Vibration} Potency she consumes 4 of it to apply 2 Count on herself and the target. Her S3 can consume up to 3 {status:Vibration} potency to gain Count on herself and inflict {status:Binding}. She then consumes all her Count to gain Coin Power and damage on the last coin.

Her S2 inflicts {status:Switch_Vibration} into {status:VibrationChainPersonality} if the target isn't already in {status:Switch_Vibration}, reducing the enemy's Clash Power by 1 for every 10 {status:Vibration} Potency up to a max of -3, while still working with any other usual effects of {status:Vibration}. Otherwise, it deals more damage.

Her first S3 use additionally gives her {status:OutisNoHat} for the rest of the encounter, giving her more {status:Vibration} Count generation and damage.

When her passive is active, she gets a free heal if she has 10-20% HP at turn end. This does not work if she dies or drops below 10%. She also gets +1 Final Power if she has {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality}.
